headline: Jim Cramer on Best Buy: “You Need Lower Rates for That One to Work”
summary: Best Buy Co., Inc. (NYSE:BBY) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer discussed, along with recent market rotation. A caller asked whether BBY’s historically moderate-to-high short-selling volume should be considered, in light of the stock’s recent upward price movement. Cramer replied: “If I think the company is crummy, I don’t regard it as an issue. […]
